title: Free Lae'zel
content:
th of the wreckage. You can fight the Tieflings to free her, or just don't get involved. (Lae'zel is a good fighter, and will provide a clue of how to Remove the Parasite. Unfortunately, the Githyanki patrol you met later won't help, but accusing you of stealing their sacred weapon and attack.)
